title: metrics
extract: Metrics are parameters or measures of quantitative assessment used for measurement, comparison, or to track performance or production. Analysts use metrics to compare the performance of different companies, despite the many variations between firms.Jun 22, 2018
extract_html: Metrics are parameters or measures of quantitative assessment used for measurement, comparison, or to track performance or production. Analysts use metrics to compare the performance of different companies, despite the many variations between firms.Jun 22, 2018
